divs: Sighting Details1. Where were you and what were you doing at the time? Outside my front door, having a cigarette 2. What made you first notice the object? Just looking at the stars and heard humming like noise, very feint. 3. What did you think the object was when you first noticed it? Military jet, stealth bomber 4. Describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. three triangular lights with center red light. The lights never blinked like a normal aircraft's would be, the lights were solid. It flew in a straight line, and then abruptly started going left (east) with no turn or banking observed. It just WENT left... 5. Describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. Freaked out. Scared. 6. How did you lose sight of the object? Trees obstructed the view after it continued on it's new course.
Summary: 3 triangulaur lights abruptly goes eastward with no banking
